original_title: Der Tag, an dem Elvis nach Bremerhaven kam
overview: A 17 year old tries to find his own identity in October 1958 while Elvis Presley begins his service as a G.I in Germany. He is torn between his parents' generation which was marked by war and the new "American way of life" which is particularly present in the town of Bremerhaven.
title: The Day Elvis Came to Bremerhaven
